## Source: amazon-inspector (12445272ee24c376909e302bc2f4fe2c23af7aae5479ca74493a57adcdd4f028)
The package o2-modal was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bf3e8611090160aa15eebc899ec461d429494a6a8241ae5ed0ecafc3bbd79a8a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'o2-modal' @ 97.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
